name: The 60 Year Week
description:
Controls UseZ / Enter / SpaceBackX / EscapeMoveArrow Keys / WASD Backstory

The year is 4150. As a delivery driver, it is your job to transport some important luggage to the planet Earth. It's a 60 year long journey so your ship is equipped with a state-of-the-art stasis pod and warp drive technology. Just try not to get lost, you'll be doing this alone.
